title: SEC Hasn't Met Requirements to Argue for an Appeal, Ripple Says
description: Ripple made its case to a federal judge for why the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission shouldn't be able to appeal her ruling on its programmatic sales of XRP on Friday.

title: Former SEC Chair Jay Clayton Says Approval of a Spot Bitcoin ETF Is ‘Inevitable’
description: On 31 August 2023, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) announced a delay in its decision-making process for seven spot Bitcoin ETF proposals. The regulatory body is currently navigating through a multitude of new applications. The decision deadlines for a range of funds, including BlackRock’s iShares Bitcoin Trust, Fidelity’s Wise Origin Bitcoin Trust, VanEck […]

title: French authorities investigate Worldcoin’s Paris HQ
description: France’s and Germany’s data regulators are jointly investigating Worldcoin’s data collection methods, specifically focusing on iris scans. France’s data protection regulatory authority, CNIL, has recently focused on Worldcoin. With a probe into the company’s Paris office this week, Worldcoin is…

title: 98.52% of WLD Investors in Loss, Is Worldcoin’s Future in Jeopardy?
description:
Worldcoin (WLD), the privacy-focused project that took the crypto industry by storm, has been in a significant bearish trend. Although the bearish trend is not unique to WLD as it impacts the overall market, data shows that WLD’s case is much worse. In particular, according to CoinMarketCap data, WLD traded at $2.4 exactly a month […]
